LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You've learned a way to increase the number of spells you can cast per day.
Benefit: You can cast two more spells per day of 1st, 2nd, and 3rd ranks each. This ability does not affect mythic spellbooks.
LocalizedStrings.ruRU:
Вы научились увеличивать количество заклинаний, которое вы можете подготовить на день.
Преимущество: вы можете сотворить по 2 дополнительных заклинания 1-го, 2-го и 3-го уровней. Эта способность не влияет на мифические книги заклинаний.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你已经学会了一种增加每天施法次数的方法。
你每天可以多施放2个1、2、3级法术。这个能力不会影响神话法术书。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You've mastered a way to increase the number of spells you can cast per day.
Benefit: You can cast two more spells per day of 7th, 8th, and 9th ranks each. This ability does not affect mythic spellbooks.
LocalizedStrings.ruRU:
Вы научились увеличивать количество заклинаний, которое вы можете подготовить на день.
Преимущество: вы можете сотворить по 4 дополнительных заклинания 7-го, 8-го и 9-го уровней. Эта способность не влияет на мифические книги заклинаний.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你已经掌握了一种增加每天施法次数的方法。
你每天可以多施放4个等级分别为7、8、9的法术。这个能力不会影响神话法术书。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You have studied a way to increase the number of spells you can cast per day.
Benefit: You can cast two more spells per day of 4th, 5th, and 6th levels each. This ability does not affect mythic spellbooks.
LocalizedStrings.ruRU:
Вы научились увеличивать количество заклинаний, которое вы можете подготовить на день.
Преимущество: вы можете сотворить по 2 дополнительных заклинания 4-го, 5-го и 6-го уровней. Эта способность не влияет на мифические книги заклинаний.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你已经研究了一种增加你每天可以施放的法术数量的方法。
你每天可以多施放2个等级分别是4、5、6级的法术。这个能力不会影响神话法术书。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 4th rank, Aeon gains an ability to make his weapons and spells especially deadly against his enemies. For a number of rounds per day equal to twice your mythic rank plus your character level, you can make any weapon you wield count as having Bane quality, your spells gain a bonus equal to your mythic rank to caster level checks to overcome spell resistance, and every hit you make with weapons or spells dispel effects from the target, as per the dispel magic spell.
Additionally, if you have inquisitor's bane ability, you gain the same bonuses while using inquisitor's bane ability.
LocalizedStrings.ruRU:
На 4-ом уровне Эон получает способность делать оружие и заклинания особенно смертноносными для своих врагов. На количество раундов в день, равное вашему удвоенному мифическому уровню, вы можете считать любое оружие, которое используете, имеющим качество Убийцы, ваши заклинания получают бонус равный мифическому уровню, к проверкам Уровня заклинателя для преодоления Устойчивости к магии, и каждое попадание оружием или заклинанием рассеивает эффекты с цели, как при использовании заклинания Рассеивание магии.
Кроме того, если у вас есть способность Инквизитора Оружие убийцы, это количество раундов в день складывается, а вы получаете те же бонусы, что при использовании способности Оружие убийцы.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 4级神话等级时，御衡者获得使他的武器变得特别致命的能力。每日角色等级+2*神话等级轮，你可以使得你装备的任何武器对任何敌人都视作有破敌的效果。此外，在御衡者破敌激活期间，你的法术穿透额外获得等同神话等级的加值，你对所有受到你的物理命中或法术伤害的敌人施放解除魔法，以角色等级作为施法者等级。最后，如果你有审判官的破敌职业能力，在审判官破敌激活期间，你也获得相同的法术穿透和解除魔法能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Aeon Bane Increase Resource Feature
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 御衡者破敌使用次数提升

LocalizedStrings.enGB: This cloak allows Trickster to roll any skill check twice and take the best result.
LocalizedStrings.ruRU: Этот пдащ позволяет Трикстеру совершать любой бросок при проверке навыка дважды и выбирать наилучший результат.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这个斗篷允许诡术大师进行任何技能检定时投掷两次并取最好的结果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You make your spells deal additional area of effect damage, while making them stronger.
Benefit: Spell now deals 2 more points of damage per die rolled to all its targets. Additionally, all enemies in 5 feet of the spell targets are dealt 2 damage per die rolled of the original spell. The spell can no longer apply precision damage.
Level Increase: +2 (A bolstered spell uses up a spell slot two levels higher than the spell's actual level.)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你使得你的法术造成每个伤害骰2点的额外伤害，并且对在5尺范围内的其他敌人也造成伤害。这个法术不再能附加精准伤害。
法术环级提升：+2

LocalizedStrings.enGB: For a number of rounds equal to 3 + half his mythic rank, a Lich can make all spells he casts to ignore spell resistance and spell immunity. Any creature affected by such spell can't cast spells for 1d3+1 rounds.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在相当于他神话等级3+一半的回合内，巫妖可以使他所施放的所有法术忽略法术抗性和法术免疫。任何受此法术影响的生物在1d3+1轮内不能施放法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You leave a mystical link with enemy spellcasters that lets you instantly move to them.Benefit: Every time you are hit by an enemy spell, you may teleport to the spellcaster as an immediate action and make an attack of opportunity.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你在敌对施法者身边留下一道神秘连接，让你可以立即移动到他们那里。
每次你被敌人法术击中时，你可以瞬间传送到施法者身边，并进行一次借机攻击。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Every time you are targeted by an enemy spell, you may teleport to the spellcaster as an immediate action and make an attack of opportunity.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每当你被敌人的法术攻击时，你可以立即传送到施法者那里，并发动借机攻击。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dimensional Retribution
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 次元反击

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once every 1d4 rounds, havoc dragon deals 6d10 points of sonic damage to everyone in a in 30-foot cone. This damage increases by 2d10 for every Azata mythic rank.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每1d4轮，狂欢龙可以对30英尺锥形范围内的所有人造成6d10点音波伤害。灵使神话等级每次提升此伤害都会增加2d10。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The dragon’s tail slap critical multiplier becomes ×3.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙尾拍击的重击倍率现在变为3。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Deadly Tail
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 致命尾翼

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A creature that fails its save against the dragon’s breath weapon becomes confused for 1 round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 对龙息豁免失败的生物现在会陷入困惑1轮。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Delirium Breath
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 狂乱吐息

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Unlike normal animals of its kind, Aivu's Hit Dice, abilities, skills, and feats advance as the Azata gains mythic ranks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 不同于它种群中的一般个体，爱乌的攻击骰、能力、技能和特性都随着灵使神话等级提升而提高。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Mythic Draconic Growth
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神话龙类成长

LocalizedStrings.enGB: When you make an attack with your tail, you can make a trip attempt as a free action that does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 当你使用尾巴攻击时可以视作进行了一次不触发借机攻击的战技。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Tail Sweep
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 尾扫

LocalizedStrings.enGB: For a number of rounds equal to 3 + half his mythic rank, a Lich can imbue all spells he casts with the powers of the Eclipse chill. Creatures affected by such spells must pass a Fortitude saving throw (DC = 10 + 1/2 character level + your mythic rank + your highest stat bonus) or become blinded and suffer (2d8 + mythic rank) cold damage, becoming vulnerable to cold and negative energy until the end of the combat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天3+神话阶层的一半{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮{/g}内，巫妖可以为自己施放的所有{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}注入噬星之寒的能量。被这些法术影响的生物必须进行强韧{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免检定{/g}（{g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g}= 10 + 你的角色等级的一半 + 你的神话阶层 + 你最高的属性调整值），失败则陷入目盲并受到{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d8{/g}+神话阶层的{g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}寒冷伤害{/g}，直到战斗结束前对寒冷和负向能量易伤。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You've mastered the art of raining elemental spells on your foes, and found a way to empower them by combining different elements.
Benefit: Every time you deal elemental damage to a creature with a spell, you apply an elemental mark to it. If during the next three rounds the marked target takes elemental damage from any source with a different element, the target takes additional Divine damage and consume the mark. The damage is 1d6 per mythic rank of your character.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你是向你的对手倾泄元素法术的大师。
每当你通过一个法术对敌人造成元素伤害，你在它身上留下一个标记。在接下来的三轮内，如果该目标受到来自任何来源的另一种元素的伤害，会消耗该标记并造成等同神话阶层乘以1d6的额外神力伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: If this creature takes elemental damage from a type other than acid it will take additional damage and consume the mark.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这个目标如果受到酸以外的元素伤害，会触发元素狂潮效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: If this creature takes elemental damage from a type other than cold it will take additional damage and consume the mark.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这个目标如果受到冰以外的元素伤害，会触发元素狂潮效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: If this creature takes elemental damage from a type other than electricity it will take additional damage and consume the mark.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这个目标如果受到电以外的元素伤害，会触发元素狂潮效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: If this creature takes elemental damage from a type other than sonic it will take additional damage and consume the mark.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这个目标如果受到火以外的元素伤害，会触发元素狂潮效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You've mastered a way to prolong your beneficial spells.
Benefit: Effects of your spells on your allies that should last longer than 8 minutes but shorter than 24 hours now last 24 hours.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你已经掌握了延长增益法术持续时间的方法。
你对盟友施放的持续时间超过8分钟但不足24小时的法术，现在持续24小时

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Azata's magic becomes incredibly more powerful. Whenever an enemy makes a saving throw against her spells, spell-like abilities, or supernatural abilities, they roll the die twice and take the worst result. Whenever the Azata makes a concentration check or a check to overcome spell resistance, she rolls twice and takes the best result. If the Azata casts a spell whose description says that a successful saving throw halves its damage or duration, it only decreases it by 25% instead.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 灵使的魔法强度剧增。每当敌人进行{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免检定{/g}来对抗灵使的{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}、类法术能力和超自然能力时，都需要掷骰两次并取最差的结果。每当灵使进行专注检定或穿透法术抗力的检定时，都可以掷骰两次并取最好的结果。如果灵使施放的法术描述中提到，豁免成功可减半伤害或持续时间，则改为只能减少25%。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Azata gains a bonus equal to her mythic rank on attack and damage rolls. Whenever she hits with a charge attack or confirms a critical hit, the target has to pass a Fortitude saving throw, with DC equal to 10 + your mythic rank + Strength modifier. If the target fails a saving throw one of the following action happens at random: Enemy is stunned for 1d4 rounds (30%) Enemy is prone for 1d4 rounds (20%) Enemy is pushed away 15 feet and is stunned for 1d4 rounds (20%) Enemy is crippled till the end of the fight: they can no longer move and suffers a -3 penalty to attack rolls and AC (15%) Enemy becomes exhausted (10%) Enemy is killed (5%) Additionally, Azata can decide to lose these advantages to instead bolster the physical abilities of companions. They gain a bonus on all attack and damage rolls equal to +1 per 2 Azata's mythic ranks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 灵使在攻击和伤害骰上获得等同于她神话阶层的加值。当她进行冲锋攻击或者确认重击时, 目标必须进行一次强韧豁免，DC等于10 + 你的神话阶层 + 力量调整值. 如果目标豁免失败，则随机发生以下情形之一: 敌人眩晕1d4轮(30%) 敌人俯卧1d4轮(20%) 敌人被推开15英尺并被震慑1d4轮(20%) 敌人残废直到战斗结束:他们不能移动，并遭受攻击骰和AC-3的减值 (15%) 敌人陷入力竭(10%) 敌人被杀死(5%) 此外，灵使可以选择失去这些优势，以提高同伴的物理能力。他们在所有攻击和伤害骰上获得加值，等于每2个灵使的神话阶层+1。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Azata chooses one teamwork feat during this and next mythic rank up. She shares the effects of all teamwork feats she has with allies within a 50-foot area. Azata's Charisma inspires her allies so much that even when their hit points drop below 0 they continue to fight, even though they are still considered dead (or unconscious) for all effects and can be cured by breath of life or similar spells as per spell description. After the encounter or upon receiving a total number of attacks equal to Azata's Mythic Rank shared among all allies, the allies in this state fall dead (or unconscious). If all of the Azata's allies die that way, she becomes fully drained and dies.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 灵使在本神话阶层与下次提升神话阶层时，各选取一项团队{g|Encyclopedia:Feat}专长{/g}。她可以将所有团队专长的效果分享给50英尺之内的盟友。灵使的感召力极大地鼓舞了盟友，他们即使{g|Encyclopedia:HP}生命值{/g}降到0以下，依然可以继续战斗，但对于所有效应而言，他们仍被视为已{g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}死亡{/g}（或昏迷），可以被“生命之息”及类似{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}治疗，根据各法术的描述而定。在遭遇结束后，或所有盟友共同受到总次数等于灵使的神话阶层的{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击{/g}后，处于此状况的盟友正常死亡。如果灵使的所有盟友都在这种情况下死亡，她的等级会全部流失，并且死去。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Azata creates a rainbow arrow that jumps from target to target up to one time per 4 caster levels, dealing 1d12 per 2 caster levels damage with one energy randomly chosen between acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sound. Additionally if the enemy fails a will saving throw they are randomly blinded, dazed, nauseated, slowed, or stunned for 3 rounds.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 灵使创造出在目标之间弹射的虹彩箭矢，弹射次数至多为每4个{g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}施法者等级{/g}1次，造成每2个施法者等级{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d12{/g}点{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}，伤害类型在酸蚀、寒冷、电击、火焰和音波中随机选择。此外如果敌人意志豁免失败，会随机陷入盲目、眩晕、反胃、缓慢、震慑中一种3秒

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Will partial
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 意志，部分生效

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Select one school of magic. All spells you cast that belong to this school have their caster level increased by 2.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 选择一个{g|Encyclopedia:Magic_School}魔法学派{/g}。你施放所有属于该学派的{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}时，{g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}施法者等级{/g}提高2级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your sneak attacks are especially deadly.
Benifit: Your sneak attack dice are one size larger than normal. For example if you would normally roll d6s for sneak attacks you would roll d8s instead.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你的神话之力加持下的偷袭攻击无比致命。
你的偷袭骰比通常大一级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: This spell grants party members additional (2d6 + Azata's caster level) sonic damage for their first weapon attack during a round, a +2 bonus to caster level checks made to overcome spell resistance, a +2 bonus to all concentration checks, and rises the DC of the saving throws against all their spells and abilities by 2.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 此{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}为全体队友每{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮{/g}第一次武器{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击{/g}提供{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g}+灵使{g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}施法者等级{/g}的额外音波{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}，为用于穿透{g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}法术抗力{/g}的施法者等级{g|Encyclopedia:Check}检定{/g}提供+2{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，为所有{g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}专注检定{/g}提供+2加值，并使抵抗目标的法术和能力的{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免检定{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DC}难度等级（DC）{/g}提高2点。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: 10 minutes/level
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 10分钟/级

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Azata is able to make one additional attack an is always under the effect of haste spell, as long as she is engaged in combat. All melee and ranged weapon attacks against her have a 20% miss chance. All targeted spells aimed at her have a 10% miss chance. All the damage from area attacks against her is halved, even if previously reduced by saving throw.
Note: When character have miss chance and concealment at the same time, then only best bonus applied.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
灵使拥有额外1次攻击，并在战斗中始终处于加速术的效果影响下。所有对她发动的远程和近战{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击{/g}有20%失手率。所有瞄准她的{g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Target}目标型法术{/g}有10%失手率。所有影响她的范围{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}都会减半，即使该伤害此前已被豁免降低过。
注意：当角色同时具有失手率和隐蔽时，仅应用其中最高的效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Whenever Lich lands a successful sneak attack, the enemy must pass Fortitude saving throw (DC = 10 + 1/2 character level + your mythic rank + your highest stat bonus) or become tainted. The tainted creature is vulnerable to all weapon and elemental damage, as well as suffers a –2 penalty on all attack rolls and weapon damage rolls, until the end of the combat.
Additionally, Lich's sneak attack damage is increased by 1d6.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}{/g}每当巫妖成功造成偷袭时，目标必须通过强韧{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免检定{/g}（{g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g}=10+ 1/2你的角色等级+你的神话阶层+你最高的属性调整值）避免被污染。被污染生物对所有武器和元素{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}易伤，并在所有{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击检定{/g}和武器伤害检定上承受-2{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，持续到战斗结束。
此外，巫妖的偷袭伤害提高1d6点。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Athletics 1 rank
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 运动1阶

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Athletics 2 rank
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 运动2阶

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Athletics 3 rank
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 运动3阶

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You now know religion so well that you can use abilities usually reserved for clerics. You can select two domains. You gain abilities of those domains and can use spells from those domains once per day.
Your effective cleric level for the purposes of these domains and spells is equal to your character level, and your effective wisdom modifer is equal to your mythic rank.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你现在非常了解宗教，你可以使用通常为牧师保留的能力。你可以选择两个领域获得其能力，并且可以每天使用一次来自这些领域的法术。你对这些领域和法术的有效牧师等级等于你的角色等级，你的有效感知调整值等于你的神话等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You now know enough about religion to start your own. You can select two additional domains.
Your effective cleric level for the purposes of these domains and spells is equal to your character level, and your effective wisdom modifer is equal to your mythic rank.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 现在你已经对宗教有了足够的了解，可以开始建立自己的宗教了。您可以选择另外两个领域获得其能力和法术，你对这些领域和法术的有效牧师等级等于你的角色等级，你的有效感知调整值等于你的神话等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Mobility 1 rank
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 灵巧1阶

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Mobility 2 rank
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 灵巧2阶

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Mobility 3 rank
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 灵巧3阶

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Perception 3 Effect
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 察觉3阶效果

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You see more than other people.
You are under a constant effect of the see invisibility spell, auto detect stealthing creatures, and reroll all concealment rolls.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你比一般人看到更多。你持续受到“侦测隐形”法术的影响，自动发现隐形生物，并重掷所有隐藏骰。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You can see the best ways to injure even the most resilient opponents.
You ignore critical and sneak attack immunity, reroll all fortification checks and your critical hit range is increased by 2 with all weapons. This critical range increase is not multiplied by improved critical or similar effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以察觉最好的方法来伤害甚至是最坚韧的对手。你忽略致命和偷袭免疫，迫使目标重新进行所有防御检定，你的致命一击范围增加2。这种临界范围的增加不会乘以精通重击或类似的效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You sight has become so impecable that you can now see how to improve the actions of your allies.
All allies within 60 feet of you gain the benifits of your perception tricks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的观察力变得如此完美，你现在可以察觉如何改善你的盟友的行动。 在你60英尺内的所有盟友都能从你的感知技巧中获益。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Creature suffers penalties to its attack and damage rolls equal to 1 + half your mythic rank.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 该生物在攻击和伤害骰上受到1+你一半的神话等级的惩罚

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Trickster Persuasion 2
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 沟通2阶

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Creature has a 50% chance to attack the nearest target each turn. Additionally they suffer pentalities to AC and spell resistance equal to equal to your mythic rank, as well as a penalty to saving throws equal to 1 + half your mythic rank.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 生物每个回合有 50% 概率攻击身边最近目标。此外他们会受到AC和法术抗力减值，减值等于你的神话阶层；受到豁免减值，减值等于1+你神话阶层的一半。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Trickster Persuasion 3
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 沟通3阶

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You are so good at demoralizing your enemies that thier will to hurt you wavers.
Enemies affected by your demoralize ability must succeed at a Will saving throw with a DC of 10 + your ranks in Persuasion, or become staggered for one round. Additionally, when you successfully demoralize an enemy they take an additional penalty to thier attack and damage rolls equal to 1 + half your mythic rank.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你如此善于挫败你的敌人，以致他们伤害你的意愿动摇了。受你挫败士气能力影响的敌人必须进行DC=10+你的说服等级的意志{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免检定{/g}，失败将陷入恍惚，持续一轮。此外，当你成功地使敌人士气低落时，他们的攻击和伤害骰将受到1 +一半你的神话等级的额外惩罚。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You are so good at demoralizing your enemies that they panic and fail to defend themselves.
Enemies affected by your demoralize have a 50% chance to attack the nearest target instead of acting normally. Additionally, when you successfully demoralize an enemy they take an additional penalty to thier AC and spell resistance equal to your mythic rank, as well as a penalty all saving throws equal to 1 + half your mythic rank.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你如此善于挫败你的敌人，以致他们伤害你的意愿动摇了。受你挫败士气能力影响的敌人必须进行DC=10+你的说服等级的意志{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免检定{/g}，失败将陷入恍惚，持续一轮。此外，当你成功地使敌人士气低落时，他们的攻击和伤害骰将受到1 +一半你的神话阶层的额外惩罚。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You can enter stealth during combat as a move action. This stealth is not broken by a single enemy detecting you — instead it acts similar to the invisibility spell, giving you total concealment against all creatures that did not succeed on a Perception check against you.
This "invisibility" cannot be seen through by divination magic such as true seeing, see invisability, or thoughtsense.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以在战斗中以移动动作进入潜行。这个潜行不会被单个敌人发现，相反，它的作用类似于隐形法术，让你对所有没有通过察觉检定的生物完全隐藏。这种“隐形”是不能被预言魔法看穿的，比如真知术，识破隐形，或侦测思想。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Trickster Stealth
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 隐匿1阶

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You can easily slip into shadow at any time. You can enter stealth during combat as a move action. This stealth is not broken by a single enemy detecting you — instead it acts similar to the invisibility spell, giving you total concealment against all creatures that did not succeed on a Perception check against you.
This "invisibility" cannot be seen through by divination magic such as true seeing, see invisibility, or thoughtsense.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以在战斗中以移动动作进入潜行。这个潜行不会被单个敌人发现，相反，它的作用类似于隐形法术，让你对所有没有通过察觉检定的生物完全隐藏。这种“隐形”是不能被预言魔法看穿的，比如真知术，识破隐形，或侦测思想。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You exceed at stealth, fading from sight with your every move. Your stealth in combat now works more akin to greater invisibility spell effect.
This "invisibility" cannot be seen through by divination magic such as true seeing, see invisability, or thoughtsense.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你潜行技艺超群，无人可以察觉你的动作。你在战斗中的潜行现在更接近于更强的隐形法术效果。这种“隐形”是不能被占卜魔法看穿的，比如真看见，看见隐形，或思想感觉。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Living creatures are also just complex devices and can also be easily disabled. You can try to disable them, forcing them to make a Fortitude saving throw (DC 15 + your ranks in Trickery). If the target fails it, it dies. Addtionally your previous Trickery abilities can now be used as a swift action and at close range instead of touch range.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 生物也只是复杂的设备，也可以很容易地被解除。你可以尝试使他们失效，迫使他们进行强韧豁免投掷(DC=15 +你的巧手等级)。如果目标失败，它就会死亡。另外，你的巧手技能现在可以作为一个迅捷动作使用，并且是在近距离而不是接触范围内使用。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can become semi-tangible as a standard action. While in this form, you are immune to critical hits and gain a +1 deflection bonus to AC. This bonus increases by 1 at 8th level and every 4 levels thereafter.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以一个标准动作，你可以进入半实体状态，在这种状态下，你对致命一击免疫，并对AC获得+1偏斜加值。该加值在第8级时增加1，之后每4级增加1。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 6th level, you can cause a host of wooden thorns to burst from your skin as a free action. While bramble armor is in effect, any foe striking you with a melee weapon without reach takes 1d6 points of piercing damage + 1 point per two levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第6级，你可以自由地让一堆木刺从你的皮肤中爆裂出来。当荆棘护甲生效时，任何使用近战武器攻击你的敌人将受到1d6+ 1/每两级(使你获得该领域的职业)的穿刺伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Use Magic Device 1 rank
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 使用魔法装置1阶

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your mastery of magic items has reached new heights.
Wands you use no longer lose charges for use and you can equip any magical items possible, regardless of requirements. Addtionally you realize that spells may be a bit less magical than you previously thought and gain the metamagic Completely Normal Spell
LocalizedStrings.ruRU:
Ваше мастерство использования магических предметов достигло новых высот.
Жезлы больше не расходуют заряды при использовании и вы можете надеть любой магиеский предмет, независимо от его требований. В дополнение к этому вы поняли, что заклинания могут быть не столь волшебны, как вам казалось, поэтому вы получаете черту Совсем Обычное Заклинание.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你对魔法物品的掌握达到了新的高度。你使用的魔杖不再失去使用次数，你可以无视需求装备任何魔法物品。此外，你意识到法术所需的魔力可能比你之前想象的要少，获得专长，超魔-超正常法术

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Use Magic Device 2 rank
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 使用魔法装置2阶

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Use Magic Device 3 rank
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 使用魔法装置3阶

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
As long as you keep fighting, the power of your melee attacks keeps growing.
Benefit: Every turn, as long as you make at least one melee attack, you gain a stacking +4 bonus to damage rolls with melee weapons, up to a maximum of +20, that lasts until the end of combat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
只要你持续战斗，你的近战攻击的力量就会不断增长。
每回合，只要你至少进行一次近战攻击，你的近战武器伤害骰就获得一个可叠加的+4加成，上限+20，直到战斗结束。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Whenever Azata casts a spell, spell-like ability, or supernatural ability that targets individual creatures, not areas, it affects one additional creature within a 30-foot range from the target. If the target is an enemy, the spell affects one additional enemy; if the target is an ally, the spell affects one additional ally. Additionally, spells that target enemies damage them for 2d6 + mythic rank.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 当灵使施放指定生物个体而非范围的法术、类法术能力或超自然能力时，该法术可以多影响距离目标30英尺内的生物。若目标是敌人，法术可多影响一个敌人；若目标是盟友，则多影响一个盟友。此外，指定敌人为目标的法术还会对他们造成2d6+神话阶层的伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Zippy Magic
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 灵动魔法
